title: Shimla-Kufri Road Partially Closed
description: Road repair work ongoing between Mall Road junction and Kufri. Expect delays of 30-45 minutes. Alternate route via Chharabra available but adds 20 minutes to journey. Work expected to complete by November 30th.

title: Light Rain Expected This Weekend
description: Meteorological department forecasts light to moderate rainfall on November 23-24. Temperature may drop to 8Â°C. Carry umbrellas and warm layers. Roads may become slippery, drive carefully. Beautiful post-rain views expected!

title: Winter Carnival at The Ridge
description: Annual Winter Carnival happening at The Ridge from November 25-28. Cultural performances, local food stalls, and handicraft exhibition. Free entry. Expect increased crowds near Mall Road and Ridge area during evening hours (5 PM - 9 PM).

title: Jakhu Ropeway Maintenance
description: Jakhu Ropeway will be closed for annual maintenance on November 26-27. Trek route to Jakhu Temple remains open. Alternative: Take taxi to base and trek remaining distance (approximately 1 km uphill).
